description: A massive island ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. It serves as both a pirate ship and a haunted island filled with zombies.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Battle Oars
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew engages in a desperate battle against the giant zombie Oars across various structures of Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle that takes place across multiple areas of the island, showcasing its gothic architecture and dangerous terrain.

keyEvents.title: Thriller Bark Being Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Oars' rampage causes massive destruction across Thriller Bark, with Hildon reporting that the island ship itself might be destroyed if the damage continues.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scale of the Oars battle and the collateral damage it causes to the massive island ship.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as Gecko Moria's base of operations during Thriller Bark arc
